Package ohos.data.search

Class SearchSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.search.SearchSession

  • public class SearchSession
extends Object
    Represents a session used for pagination or group search.

    You can obtain a search session by calling SearchAbility#beginSearch(String, String) and perform search operations. If the search session is no longer needed, call SearchAbility#endSearch(String, String, SearchSession) to end the session and release resources. This class is thread-safe. A search session can be used by multiple threads.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_SEARCH

    • Method Detail

      • getSearchHitCount

        public int getSearchHitCount​(String queryJsonStr)
        Obtains the number of results matching a specified string.

        This method quickly returns the number of matched results. After obtaining this number, you can call search(java.lang.String,int,int) to perform a pagination search.

        Parameters:
        queryJsonStr - Indicates the string to match.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of results matching the specified string.
        Since:
        3

      • search

        public List<IndexData> search​(String queryJsonStr,
                              int start,
                              int limit)
        Obtains the results matching a specified string on a page.

        This method is generally called after the total number of results matching a specified string is obtained using getSearchHitCount(java.lang.String).

        Parameters:
        queryJsonStr - Indicates the string to match.
        start - Indicates the index of the first matched result in the result set. The value starts from 0. If the value is greater than the total number of matched results, an empty list will be returned.
        limit - Indicates the maximum number of results allowed on this page. The value cannot exceed 10,000.
        Returns:
        Returns the results matching the specified string on a page.
        Since:
        3

      • groupSearch

        public List<Recommendation> groupSearch​(String queryJsonStr,
                                        int groupLimit)
        Obtains and groups the results matching a specified string.

        The matched results are grouped based on fields. The recommended maximum number of groups returned for each field (Recommendation) is specified by groupLimit.

        Parameters:
        queryJsonStr - Indicates the string to match.
        groupLimit - Indicates the maximum number of groups returned for each field.
        Returns:
        Returns the search results in multiple groups.
        Since:
        3
